description.narrative: Output 3.3: By 2018, the water and sanitation sector has a strategy, a coordination mechanism, an effective monitoring and evaluation system and strengthened capacities, which contributes to Wash â€“ General, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 3: By 2018, children, in particular the most vulnerable, have access to improved water sources and adequate sanitation facilities in schools, health centers and communities to prevent diseases, including in emergency situations.

title.narrative: Output 3.3: By 2018, the water and sanitation sector has a strategy, a coordination mechanism, an effective monitoring andevaluation system and strengthened capacities

description.narrative: In 2018, the sector was strengthened through the implementation of the PROSEHA, the basket fund and the consultations between the Government its partners. The CLTS upscaling documents were developed as well as the M&E operationalization manual and a baseline survey of the key indicators of the PROSEHA was conducted. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2019
